story.storybody:
Gurgaon based GRMI is a pioneer of a curriculum in risk management that helps to educate aspiring professionals for a successful career in the domain of Risk Management. It is the first-of-its-kind comprehensive risk management curriculum which covers courses such as manufacturing retail, banking, life sciences, telecom, hospitality, etc.

Courses offered:

PGDRM (Post Graduate Diploma in Risk Management), 1 year

PGDRM is a full-time one year class room education programme with live case studies that aims to provide practical exposure to the students.

Career prospects:

The institute trains the students about Risk Management in a world class environment, thus creating an ecosystem that enables the companies to hire trained risk managers. 

Critical Associations are already in place or in advanced stages of discussion:

GRMI has already signed an MoU with the Institute of Internal Auditors of India. Being a single largest globally accepted Institution in the field of Internal Audit, this partnership allows GRMI to work with the best and largest institutions.

Similarly, GRMI has also signed a strategic partnership with the Society of Human Resource Management ('SHRM'), which is an acclaimed global NGO with leading HR leaders and practitioners across India and the globe.

For more info, please visit: http://www.grm.institute/
